meanings.definition: A type of paper with a particular size and format used for writing or printing.
meanings.sent1: I need foolscaps to write my story neatly.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out foolscaps for the students to complete their assignments.
meanings.sent3: The foolscaps were so big, they looked like giant sheets of white snowflakes.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas flowed freely on the foolscaps, like a river of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The foolscaps whispered stories of adventures waiting to be written.
